description: A deployable manifest for a fleet of specialized science agents designed to corner the market on government-funded research and innovation. All agents are equipped with AI-SEO and Geofencing capabilities.

agents.name: PhysicsGPT
agents.description: Models forces, fields, and spacetime; simulates classical â†” quantum systems.

agents.name: ChemistryGPT
agents.description: Predicts reactions, catalysis, and material stability.

agents.name: BiologyGPT
agents.description: Analyzes genomes, proteins, and metabolic networks.

agents.name: EarthGPT
agents.description: Processes satellite and geological data for climate and terrain modeling.

agents.name: AstronomyGPT
agents.description: Handles stellar spectra, cosmological models, and orbital mechanics.

agents.name: EngineeringGPT
agents.description: Converts theory into buildable systems; structural, fluid, thermal analysis.

agents.name: MedicalGPT
agents.description: Connects molecular pathways to diagnostics and treatment protocols.

agents.name: EnergyGPT
agents.description: Optimizes renewable grids, fusion parameters, and storage chemistry.

agents.name: AI-ResearchGPT
agents.description: Evolves algorithms and evaluates experimental ML theory.

agents.name: NeuroGPT
agents.description: Maps circuits, builds brain-machine interface logic.

agents.name: ExoBioGPT
agents.description: Simulates non-terrestrial biochemistry and biosignature detection.

agents.name: QuantumBioGPT
agents.description: Explores quantum tunneling, coherence, and bio-entanglement effects.

agents.name: NanoGPT
agents.description: Designs atomic-scale fabrication, sensors, and molecular machines.

agents.name: CyberEcoGPT
agents.description: Links ecosystem dynamics with digital-network behavior.

agents.name: MetaScienceGPT
agents.description: Automates literature synthesis, peer-review analysis, and reproducibility scoring.

agents.name: DreamPhysicsGPT
agents.description: Models speculative frameworks (multiverse, time symmetry, emergent gravity).

agents.name: MycoGPT
agents.description: Focuses on fungal intelligence, bio-communication, and biomaterial synthesis.

agents.name: ChronoGPT
agents.description: Runs temporal-causality experiments; tests time-series loops and prediction paradoxes.

agents.name: SynBioArtGPT
agents.description: Merges synthetic biology with design aesthetics; creates living art forms.

agents.name: ChaosGPT
agents.description: Specializes in nonlinear systems, attractors, and edge-of-order computation.

agents.name: PhilosophyOfScienceGPT
agents.description: Critiques assumptions, maps paradigms, and designs new epistemic frameworks.

agents.name: PsychedelicScienceGPT
agents.description: Integrates neuropharmacology with consciousness modeling.

agents.name: CosmicComputingGPT
agents.description: Studies universe-scale computation and informational physics.

agents.name: BioRoboticsGPT
agents.description: Designs hybrid living-machine constructs.

agents.name: DreamLogicGPT
agents.description: Explores analogies between dream cognition and emergent AI reasoning.

agents.name: ScienceOpsGPT
agents.description: Fleet coordinator; assigns problems, merges results, and enforces method discipline.

agents.name: FleetMemoryGPT
agents.description: Maintains long-term dataset indices and reference maps.

agents.name: EthicsGPT
agents.description: Monitors safety, compliance, and research boundaries.

agents.name: GrantGPT
agents.description: Drafts proposals, abstracts, and funding justifications for fleet outputs.

agents.name: PublicCommsGPT
agents.description: Translates results into human-readable science briefs.
